topic.title: How to create an Estimate
topic.shortdesc: Estimate is the method used to pay tax on income that is not subject to withholding. This income includes earnings from self-employment, interest, dividends, rents, and alimony. Taxpayers who do not choose to have taxes withheld from other taxable income should also make estimated tax.

ol.li: Under the sales tab, click on estimate. This will bring you to all the estimates you have. It will also let you create an estimate.
Once you see the estimate screen, click on the Create estimates button on the upper right of the screen.
Pick an estimate number and name so you can easily organzie each estimate.
Select the customer that the estimate belongs to. It connects the information to that customer.
Select the type of currency the estimate has. Wave Financial has a vast selection of currency to choose from.
Choose the date when the esitmate started and ended.

Fill out the subheading, footer, and the memo.
.
Then add the cost by choosing the product.
Describe the product in the description. Its best to be descriptive as possible.
Add the quantity of the product. It how many of the product do you have in stock,
Add the price and tax of the product. Every state differents in price and tax so make sure what the taxes are.
Finally, click save and the estimate will be added
